author: sharonlQ9919OD
title: Great stay at the Ritz Carlton Battery Park
text: This hotel is beautiful. Ideally located to Wall Street and the World Trade Center memorial. The rooms are beautiful with a tub and the bathrooms are excellently appointed. The bed is extremely comfortable as well. It is like you are not even in the city since it is so quiet.
